Anggaran PBI BPJS Solo Membengkak 77M, Ada Potensi Peserta Mandiri Beralih ke PBI
06 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Wiwid Widha


Anggaran PBI BPJS Solo Membengkak 77M, Ada Potensi Peserta Mandiri Beralih ke PBI

KBRN, Surakarta: Pemerintah Kota maupun DPRD Surakarta masih dipusingkan dengan persoalan kenaikan premi Badan Penyelenggara Jaminan Sosial (BPJS) kesehatan. Pasalnya kenaikan premi 100% membawa dampak bagi pembiayaan Penerima Bantuan Iuran (PBI) BPJS pada tahun 2020 dari APBD.Anggota Komisi 4 DPRD Kota Surakarta ASIH Sunjoto Putro memprediksikan, anggaran untuk PBI BPJS yang dibiayai pemerintah kota akan membengkak hingga Rp 77 miliar. Asumsi ini berdasarkan pembiayaan PBI premi BPJS  pada tahun 2020 nanti Rp 37 M untuk kepesertaan 137 ribu warga."Dengan kenaikan BPJS 100 % maka prediksi premi Rp 37 M akan dikalikan 2,  masih ditambah tunggakan atau hutang premi Pemkot ke BPJS Rp 2,6 M," ungkapnya kepada wartawan, Rabu (6/11/2019).Berdasarkan KUA PPAS Rp 27,5 M sehingga ada kekurangan Premi Rp 12 M. Namun jumlah itu belum memprediksikan kenaikan premi. "Jadi 100 persen itu masih kekurangan. Prediksi kenaikan seperti ini 37 M ditambah 26 M berarti 77M, ditambah juga dimungkinan peserta BPJS mandiri akan berubah ke PBI," ujarnya.Menurut Asih Sunjoto Putro, perlu mencari solusi penganggaran terkait persoalan yang akan muncul. Mengingat dalam pembahasan KUA PPAS APBD 2020 kemampuan Pemerintah Kota baru  tersedia 27,5 M."Belum lagi prediksi jika kemampuan masyarakat yang selama ini membayar BPJS secara mandiri, dengan kenaikan iuran itu akan beralih ke PBI yang dibiayai Pemkot," pungkasnya.

PBJ's Solo BPI Budget Swells 77M, There Are Potential Independent Participants Switching to PBI
06 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Wiwid Widha


PBJ's Solo BPI Budget Swells 77M, There Are Potential Independent Participants Switching to PBI

KBRN, Surakarta: The city government and the Surakarta DPRD are still troubled by the issue of health insurance premium increase (BPJS). Because the increase of 100% premiums had an impact on the financing of BPJS Recipient Assistance (PBI) in 2020 from the APBD. Surakarta City DPRD Commission 4 Member ASIH Sunjoto Putro predicted, the budget for PBI BPJS financed by the city government would swell to Rp 77 billion. This assumption is based on BPJS premium financing PBI in 2020 Rp 37 billion for membership of 137 thousand residents. "With an increase of 100% BPJS, the prediction of Rp 37 billion premiums will be multiplied by 2, still added arrears or premiums from the municipal government to BPJS Rp 2.6 billion. , "he told reporters on Wednesday (11/06/2019). Based on KUA PPAS Rp. 27.5 billion, so there was a lack of premium of Rp. 12 billion. But that number did not predict the increase in premiums. "So 100 percent is still lacking. Predictions of increases like this 37 M plus 26 M means 77M, plus it is also possible that independent BPJS participants will change to PBI," he said. According to Asih Sunjoto Putro, it is necessary to find budgeting solutions related to problems that will arise. Considering that in the discussion of KUA PPAS APBD 2020 the ability of the City Government is only 27.5 billion. "Not to mention the prediction if the ability of the people who have been paying BPJS independently, with the increase in fees will move to PBI financed by the City Government," he concluded.
